vlive.korean: 그렇죠. 너무나 괴로운 것. -진짜. Right. Very painful. -Really. 듣기 View video BURUDA CONCERT : [BURUDA LIVE] 결론은, 사랑노래 3화. 루빈(Ruvin) & 빨간의자(Redchair)
